"Chaotic Pranksters' Sneer":
"We have confirmed reports of space-time
distortions caused by runaway Ether activity
in the Las Vegas area of planet Earth.
These distortions have caused enemies from
other planets to appear in the area.
All ARKS are to deploy as soon as you are
able and take control of the situation.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting [2,280] Quest Points.
Quest Points shared by all players in room."

"This area is currently experiencing
space-time distortions due to
unusually high levels of Ether activity!"

"Because of those distortions,
enemies that normally only
appear on other planets have
shown up! It's chaos out there!"

"This won't be an easy
fight. Please, be careful!"
